chart.title: Share of the population with access to electricity
chart.subtitle: Having access to electricity is defined in international statistics as having an electricity source that can provide very basic lighting, and charge a phone or power a radio for 4 hours per day.
chart.citation: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
